statements: SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, description FROM user_activities WHERE activity_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM user_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 2 AND activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_id DESC, activity_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Logout' ORDER BY user_id, activity_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, description FROM user_activities WHERE description LIKE '%successful%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp, description FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activities WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%'
SELECT user_id, activity_type, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity FROM user_activities GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_type) AS num_activities FROM user_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_activities > 5
SELECT * FROM user_logs;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activity FROM user_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_name, device_type FROM user_devices JOIN user_roles ON user_devices.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_logs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY log_id DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM user_devices WHERE device_type = 'phone' AND user_id = 3 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_logs JOIN user_devices ON user_logs.user_id = user_devices.user_id WHERE user_logs.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 'fbf96f56-53cc-4a20-9f9b-975c0a9e93c2';
SELECT log_event, timestamp FROM user_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, device_id, log_event FROM access_logs WHERE device_id = 'f0c7b48e-750c-4fe4-ada8-c95de67896ff' ORDER BY log_event ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_event, timestamp FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, log_event FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY device_id, timestamp;
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE log_event LIKE '%error%' AND timestamp < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type='login';
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, p.can_access FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activities;
SELECT DISTINCT(device_type) FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, p.can_access FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.can_access = TRUE ORDER BY u.username DESC, d.device_name ASC;
